mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_role( name, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, is_sys, useable ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{sysData}, #{useable} )
